existing-radio.legend: Is your complaint about an existing order?

previous-radio.legend: Have you already complained about this issue?

additional-radio.legend: Have you previously been in contact about this enquiry?

online-hint.label: A COL number is a Certificate Online number that is sent in the confirmation email when certificates are ordered online. COL numbers typically look like this COL123456/2015

telephone-hint.a: The account number will have been given to you when you placed your order by telephone. Account numbers aways start with HMPO and typically look like this HMPO45678ERF0.
telephone-hint.b: If you can't find your account number, you may have to send us a copy of the certificate.

post-hint.a: The account number will have been given to you when you placed your order by post. Account numbers aways start with HMPO and typically look like this HMPO45678ERF0.
post-hint.b: If you can't find your account number, you may have to send us a copy of the certificate.

order-number-text.label: What is the order number?
order-number-text.hint: Your order number would have been given to you when you ordered by telephone. Order numbers typically look like this 12345-1

email-hint.label: If you placed your order online, you should use the same email address
